Ryazani news

In Ryazani, they'll change the bus No. 20 pattern.

25.01.2024 17:28
Additional buses will also be added on the route.

In Russia, more than 40 payments have been indexed since 1 February and the matttrapy will increase

25.01.2024 17:07
The indexation decision will affect some 20 million people throughout Russia.

A fine of 55,000 roubles was imposed for insults and violence against DPS inspectors in Ryazan province

25.01.2024 16:47
Everything happened when the car where the man was in the passenger seat stopped the police to check.

In Ryazani, they launched the 52nd Star Trek

25.01.2024 16:08
This year, a large-scale action has been devoted to the 1980s since the complete lifting of the Leningrad blockade.

The Ryazan Prosecutor ' s Office sued school No. 17

25.01.2024 15:39
Previously, the prosecutor ' s office at school had been tested.

Ryazans at the birth of a child can receive a number of payments

25.01.2024 15:25
For example, families can receive a one-time payment at the birth of a child in the region - 20,000 roubles.

Ryzanka complained about a man who guarded her near the ATM and chased her.

25.01.2024 15:21
The negate started stalking razors at one of the shopping centres, then went to her before she came in and tried to talk.

In the razana route, a woman fell and broke her ribs.

25.01.2024 14:54
Witnesses are asked to answer the phone.

On 26 January, cold water will be shut off in the Rozke

25.01.2024 14:35
The water won't be on three streets.

Pavel Malkov congratulated the razor students on the holiday.

25.01.2024 14:29
The head of the region issued his statement in the Contact.

Central Federal District in the leaders of the Russian Developments

25.01.2024 13:42
The three leaders are rounded up by the number of lectures and creative meetings held during the Russian Society ' s " Knowledge " campaign.

Bastrikin has been instructed to institute criminal proceedings because of the emergency house on Colgozna Street.

25.01.2024 13:31
A building built in 1954, with over 80 per cent of its design, is considered to be emergency in 2017. But people still live in it.

The Ryazan State Agency confirmed that snow could be stored in the yards

25.01.2024 13:18
Managers don't punish that.

A 43-year-old driver was killed on a track in Shilov district

25.01.2024 12:53
Police officers are working at the scene.

Ryazani's pensioner won a million rubles in a new year's lottery.

25.01.2024 12:27
The Ryazan retiree bought five lottery tickets at the Russian Post Office. As a result, one of the tickets was winning.

More than 250 razors became " Productivity leaders "

25.01.2024 11:40
Owners and business managers are trained free of charge in business efficiency instruments.

Six people were injured in the Shatsk area

25.01.2024 11:14
The crash is verified.

The Government of Ryazan province will launch a traffic control service

25.01.2024 10:29
The Service will operate at the Regional Road Directorate.

There's a man out of the window.

25.01.2024 08:49
The victim is about 40 years old.

In Ryazani, there are crooks in the apartments under the view of electricity.

25.01.2024 07:41
The police couldn't help it.

In Ryazani, the veteran of work, Maria Lukinska, celebrated the centuries-old anniversary.

25.01.2024 07:26
Maria Vasilievna was born in the village of the Baja district of Sarajevo.

An exhibition of the 80th anniversary of the lifting of the blockade of Leningrad was opened at the Ryazan Arts Museum

24.01.2024 21:13
27 January is a great day in Russia's history. Day of military glory. Day of complete release of Leningrad from the fascist blockade. In the Ryazan Arts Museum, a special exhibition entitled " Road life " was attached to this milestone.

In the Ryazan region, more than 116 kilometres of regional tracks are repaired

24.01.2024 20:48
Work will take place on the " Safe Quality Roads " project.

Ryuzan investigators solved the crime 27 years ago.

24.01.2024 20:37
For a long time, a man was in federal custody.

The Ministry of Health commented on the lack of vital drugs in the oncodispenser

24.01.2024 19:59
We will recall that complaints about the lack of drugs appeared in the media on 24 January.

Ryazan Oncodispanse changed the parking regulations

24.01.2024 19:15
This institution was reported at its site in Connectact.

On 25 January, students will be able to visit Locomotive for free

24.01.2024 17:50
We can visit him from 3:00 to 20:45.

On the Ryumin pond of Ryazani re-established the skis for the duck.

24.01.2024 17:46
Half is an unbearable water space in which birds are usually wintered.

A new mortgage programme is available in Ryazanc province

24.01.2024 17:13
Savings on a monthly payment with a loan of 6 million roubles are over 5,000 roubles.

In the centre of Ryazani, the tractor broke the stop pavilion.

24.01.2024 16:44
The picture appeared in social media.
